views.name: New issue
views.title: Report a new bug
views.description: Enter the current date for the report date. Include a short description of the issue, what is currently happening versus what the expected behavior is.  Select the priority level of the issue depending on its impact on the users.
views.submit_action_message: Thank you for reporting this bug. We will begin working on resolving the issue right away!

rows.field_189453: When storing HD pictures, acknowledgement message error appears
rows.field_189478: No error message to appear, app should be able to handle high definition pics.

rows.field_189452: App doesn't scale down to mobile view
rows.field_189453: It is zooming in and not including the entire view of the app when opened on a mobile device.
rows.field_189478: Expected to zoom according to screen size to always fit the screen.

rows.field_189453: Uploaded pictures take a long time to upload.
rows.field_189478: Once pictures are uploaded, they should load instantly.

rows.field_189453: Many payments are timing out and getting rejected.
rows.field_189478: Payment authorization issued and expense incurred.

rows.field_189452: Screen freezes when accessing beta features
rows.field_189453: The screen is freezing when trying to access different beta features and new filters.
rows.field_189478: Beta features are accessible without any lag or delay.

rows.field_189453: The app will randomly freeze and refresh on its own.
rows.field_189478: The app should only refresh when prompted.

rows.field_189453: The app will keep the user logged in until the user opts to log out.
rows.field_189478: The app will keep the user logged in until the user opts to log out.

rows.field_189453: Some of the filters don't work, but they don't throw any errors.
rows.field_189478: The user should have access to all pic filters and they should load quickly.

rows.field_189456: Enhances the picture in a variety of ways depending on the filter selected.
It installs the component of the app that detects human faces.
Integrates the microservice that handles payment.
Allows the border of the picture to be blurred out.
Allows the border of the pic to be blurred.
Integrates the microservice that links to the backend database that stores the credentials.
Allows the user to select from a variety of backgrounds designed.
Allows the user to "react" to certain pictures in a variety of ways.

rows.field_189471: Virtual backgrounds attached behind the streaming video you can select from,
You use common words as "reactions" on other pictures, not only emojis.

rows.field_189469: the latest adobe flash installed on the device
rows.field_189471: Allows the users to access a variety of new filters.

rows.field_189468: Accepts Paypal, credit cards, and AE
rows.field_189469: Credit card number, billing address, phone number, and name
rows.field_189471: Now accepts multiple forms of payment beyond just credit card.

rows.field_189469: Uploaded picture or recent picture taken.
rows.field_189471: Allows the user to manipulate the border of the photos, blur the edges, round the edges, etc.

rows.field_189468: Can use Google or Facebook as account
rows.field_189469: Google or Facebook need to be logged in
rows.field_189471: Integrates with Google and Facebook's authentication service, allowing you to link accounts.
